hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Amr bin Shu'aib, from his father, that his grandfather said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'No man is bound by a transaction involving the sale of something that he does not possess

chapter.ara-name: باب بَيْعِ مَا لَيْسَ عِنْدَ الْبَائِعِ
chapter.eng-name: Selling What the Seller Does Not Have
